tech_news.title: Google releases factory, OTA images for second Pixel December 2025 update - 9to5Google
tech_news.description: On Wednesday, Google started rolling out a second December 2025 update for Pixel phones, with factory and OTA images now available.

tech_news.title: Gemini isn’t replacing Google Assistant on Android just yet - The Verge
tech_news.description: Google is pushing back its timeline for replacing Google Assistant with Gemini on Android, as it now says it will continue upgrading devices into 2026, rather than by the end of 2025.

tech_news.title: Nintendo Might Change The Switch 2 Feature Players Complain About Most - GameSpot
tech_news.description: This may be a welcome development for Nintendo Switch 2 players who hate Game-Key Cards.

tech_news.title: Riot Games is making an anti-cheat change that could be rough on older PCs - Ars Technica

tech_news.description: Is this the start of an eventual competitor to the Google and Apple app stores?

tech_news.title: Netflix is acquiring an avatar company as it moves into party games - The Verge
tech_news.description: Netflix is acquiring avatar company Ready Player Me so that users will be able to build avatars to use in Netflix’s games.
